parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: Pathname of the forming tool part file in the Design Library

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: Whether to reverse the direction of the cut of the forming tool when inserted

parameters.name: Config
parameters.description: Name of the configuration of the forming tool to insert

parameters.name: OverrideDoc
parameters.description: True to override the document settings in Tools > Options > Document Properties > Sheet Metal, false to not

parameters.name: ShowPunch
parameters.description: True to display the cut of the forming tool when the part is flattened, false to not; valid only if OverrideDoc = true

parameters.name: ShowProfile
parameters.description: True to display the placement sketch of the forming tool when the part is flattened, false to not; valid only if OverrideDoc = true

parameters.name: ShowCenter
parameters.description: True to display the center mark where the forming tool is located in the flat pattern, false to not; valid only if OverrideDoc = true

parameters.name: LinkToPart
parameters.description: True to link the forming tool feature to its part in the Design Library, false to not

title: IFeatureManager.InsertFormToolFeature
description: Obsolete. Superseded by IFeatureManager::CreateDefinition and IFeatureManager::CreateFeature.
signature:
Feature InsertFormToolFeature( 
   System.String
Path
,
   System.Boolean
Flip
,
   System.Double
RotAngle
,
   System.String
Config
,
   System.Boolean
OverrideDoc
,
   System.Boolean
ShowPunch
,
   System.Boolean
ShowProfile
,
   System.Boolean
ShowCenter
,
   System.Boolean
LinkToPart
)

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: Pathname of the forming tool part file in the Design Library

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: Whether to reverse the direction of the cut of the forming tool when inserted

parameters.name: Config
parameters.description: Name of the configuration of the forming tool to insert

parameters.name: OverrideDoc
parameters.description: True to override the document settings in Tools > Options > Document Properties > Sheet Metal, false to not

parameters.name: ShowPunch
parameters.description: True to display the cut of the forming tool when the part is flattened, false to not; valid only if OverrideDoc = true

parameters.name: ShowProfile
parameters.description: True to display the placement sketch of the forming tool when the part is flattened, false to not; valid only if OverrideDoc = true

parameters.name: ShowCenter
parameters.description: True to display the center mark where the forming tool is located in the flat pattern, false to not; valid only if OverrideDoc = true

parameters.name: LinkToPart
parameters.description: True to link the forming tool feature to its part in the Design Library, false to not

remarks:
Before calling this method, select either a face or a 2D sketch containing points. If you select:
face, a single instance of the Design Library forming tool is placed on it.
sketch containing points, an instance of the Design Library forming tool is placed at each point in the sketch.
To create your own forming tool, call
IFeatureManager::CreateFormTool
.
